title: Cisco SD-WAN Zero Day — CVE-2026-20127 (CVSS 10.0)
summary: Critical authentication bypass in Cisco Catalyst SD-WAN Controller allows unauthenticated remote admin takeover. Actively exploited by UAT-8616 since 2023. Canadian Cyber Centre issued alert. Any client running Cisco SD-WAN needs emergency patching.

title: UFP Technologies Ransomware — Medical Device Supply Chain
summary: Medical device manufacturer hit with ransomware on Feb 14, data exfiltrated, filed with SEC. Healthcare supply chain continues to be a top target. Third-party risk management is a core CMMC requirement.

title: Reuters: CMMC Creating Barriers for Small DIB Suppliers
summary: New CMMC self-assessment requirements (Level 1) straining small defense contractors. Level 2 audits expected by November 2026. Companies need to contact C3PAOs by Q2. Core opportunity for Capital Cyber and Cyber Grants Alliance.

title: Active CMMC Contract Tracker — Growing Adoption
summary: Naval Sea Logistics Center and other agencies actively requiring CMMC compliance in new solicitations. PreVeil tracking live contracts. Monitor this list for client opportunities.

title: MSSP Industry Shifting to Outcome-Led Services
summary: MSSPs moving from tool stacking to scalable, outcome-driven delivery. 2026 MSSP Blueprint recommends autonomous, proactive security models at machine speed. Validates Capital Cyber direction.

title: SLCGP Extended + PILLAR Act — Federal Cyber Grant Funding
summary: Congress extended State and Local Cybersecurity Grant Program. Texas FY2026 SLCGP assessment projects already posted. Other states expected to follow. Key pipeline for Cyber Grants Alliance.

title: CYBERSPAN: AI-Driven Agentless Detection for MSSPs
summary: IntelliGenesis launched CYBERSPAN, agentless network detection designed for MSSP environments. Worth evaluating — agentless means easier deployment for smaller clients.

title: StateTech: What States Should Fund With 2026 Cyber Grants
summary: Priority areas for 2026 grants: AI-driven cybersecurity transformation, autonomous defense, governance, workforce readiness. Use these priorities to frame grant applications.
